desc: Earn your Certified Meeting Professional CMP® designation on your first try! You will learn what you need to know for the certified meeting professional exam through practice questions, examples, sample tests and 8 hours of instruction. 100% pass rate!

layout.text: BECOME A MEETING & EVENT PROFESSIONAL TODAY! Our online and in-class training comes complete with study guides, practice exams and our instructors bring in real-life experience to help you advance your career. Learn more about the industry and become a Certified Meeting Professional TODAY!
